channel.title: general on Asep Bagja & Co.
channel.description: Recent content in general on Asep Bagja & Co.

item.title: Is Learning to Code Necessary for Everyone?
item.author: asep.bagja.p@gmail.com (Asep Bagja Priandana)
item.description: Although coding is not a basic communication skill for human, I prefer to encourage people for learning it, especially for someone who wants to expresses and develops his/her idea in technology industry but doesn’t come from computer science background.

item.title: Me and Programming Languages
item.author: asep.bagja.p@gmail.com (Asep Bagja Priandana)
item.description: This is the story of my life about my relationship with some programming languages from the first time I learnt computer programming until now.
